Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $39.00 Giveaway of the day — MiniTool Mobile Recovery for Android 1.0 Android Data Recovery Software for Android Phones and Tablets User rating: 2 (50%) 2 (50%) Leave a comment 
MiniTool Mobile Recovery for Android 1.0 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now MiniTool Mobile Recovery for Android 1.0 Terms and conditions 
MiniTool Mobile Recovery for Android is a piece of data recovery software which focuses on Android devices. It can be used to recover lost data on Android devices and SD cards. And the recoverable data covers various kinds of data, including photos, messages, contacts, call history, and more, which are deleted by mistake, attacked by virus, or lost after phone resetting. 
NB: The license is provided for one year. System Requirements: 
Windows XP/ Vista /7 /8 /10 (32 bit and 64 bit) Publisher:
